title: Looking for Berlin design agencies
content:
I have a request regarding design agencies in Berlin that could be of interest visiting (40 min–1h approximately) for a group of Swedish typographers from the Stockholm Typographic Guild, any good ideas?

ƒ
author: fredo

comments.content:
Here's my (rather inadequate) list:

Alessio Leonardi  
Die Gestalten  
Fork  
FontShop  
LucasFonts  
Meta Design  
Moniteurs  
PrimeType  
SpiekermannPartners  
Verena Gerlach and her students  
Xplicit

I feel like I left so many people out, because, well I've left so much out :( I'm not having a very good brain day. Maybe others will chime in. I'm in Berlin almost half of the time now, too. I'd certainly love to meet with you and pretend to speak Swedish. But I am not an agency.

Thanks, Tiffany, Dan.

I'll pass this on to the guild elders and we'll see what comes out of it.
